com.paydiant.android.ui.service.gcm

Interface IGCMUtilityService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GCMUtilityService

    public interface IGCMUtilityService
    A utility service defining the operations to register for GCM, with GCM connection servers and/or the Paydiant servers.
    Since:
    4.5.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant
    See Also:
    GooglePlayServicesUtil, GoogleCloudMessaging, IPaydiantGCMUtilityFacade

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void isRegisteredWithPaydiant()
      Checks whether the current device is registered with Paydiant Servers for GCM notifications.
      void register(String senderId)
      Registers the device with GCM connection servers and Paydiant Servers for GCM.
      void registerWithPaydiant(String registrationId)
      Registers the device specific registration id with the Paydiant Servers for GCM notifications.
      void removeListener()
      Removes the listener.
      void setGCMUtilityServiceListener(IGCMUtilityServiceListener listener)
      Sets the listener to handle GCMUtilityService callbacks.
      void unregister()
      Unregisters this device from GCM connection servers and Paydiant Servers.
      void unregisterFromPaydiant()
      Unregisters this device only from Paydiant Servers.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        void register(String senderId)
        Registers the device with GCM connection servers and Paydiant Servers for GCM. The registration id issued when registering with the GCM servers will be returned with the IGCMUtilityServiceListener.onRegistrationSuccess(String) listener callback method.

        Note: As per the guidelines given in Implementing GCM Client, a new app version would require new registration id, since the existing one is not guaranteed to work with the new app version.
        Parameters:
        senderId - The sender id assigned for the project when registering with the Google API console.
        See Also:
        GoogleCloudMessaging.register(String...), IPaydiantGCMUtilityFacade.registerForGCM(String)

      • registerWithPaydiant

        void registerWithPaydiant(String registrationId)
        Registers the device specific registration id with the Paydiant Servers for GCM notifications.

        Note: This method will not register the device with the GCM connection servers. App developers will be responsible for providing the implementation of registering with GCM connection servers and obtaining the registration id. Consider using register(String) instead, to register with GCM connection servers and Paydiant Servers.
        Parameters:
        registrationId - registration id obtained when registering with GCM connection servers.
        See Also:
        IPaydiantGCMUtilityFacade.registerForGCM(String)

      • isRegisteredWithPaydiant

        void isRegisteredWithPaydiant()
        Checks whether the current device is registered with Paydiant Servers for GCM notifications.
        See Also:
        IPaydiantGCMUtilityFacade.isRegisteredForGCM()

      • unregister

        void unregister()
        Unregisters this device from GCM connection servers and Paydiant Servers.
        See Also:
        GoogleCloudMessaging.unregister(), IPaydiantGCMUtilityFacade.unregister()

      • unregisterFromPaydiant

        void unregisterFromPaydiant()
        Unregisters this device only from Paydiant Servers. App developers will be responsible for implementing the GCM connection server unregistering.
        See Also:
        IPaydiantGCMUtilityFacade.unregister()

      • setGCMUtilityServiceListener

        void setGCMUtilityServiceListener(IGCMUtilityServiceListener listener)
        Sets the listener to handle GCMUtilityService callbacks.
        Parameters:
        listener - An instance of IGCMUtilityServiceListener implementation or extended implementation.

      • removeListener

        void removeListener()
        Removes the listener.
